title: Craftsmart: christmas special
creator_credit: Lennox Television Productions, Kingwest Productions and Phillip Harris
brief_description: Great Australian Christmas decoration ideas, with Lena Williams who gives step by step instructions to make low cost, easy and highly decorative handicrafts including a traditional Christmas wreath and an Australian Christmas table setting complete with bread basket, napkins, salt and pepper shakers and an Australian centrepiece and bon bons.
